ValidationRule.description: Allow Employee to only move to valid status.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: User__r.Id = $User.Id && ISCHANGED(Status__c) && NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Review Action Plan (Manager)") || ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "In Review (Employee)") || ISPICKVAL(Status__c, "Draft (Manager)"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You may only change status to Review Action Plan.
